Name: Entrance
Description: Mysterious archway looming over your head

Name: Great Hall
Description: A large chandalier lights up the room and high vaulted ceilings seem to become the night sky

Name: Corridor
Description: I see you've chosen to continue exploring this castle

Name: Store Room
Description: This is where weary travelers come to restock their stores and the cook comes to grab food

Name: Kitchen
Description: Cook rules supreme… but you may be able to sneak a bite

Name: Wet Dungeon
Description: Beware of illness and black mold

Name: Armory
Description: Come here to replenish your weapons and sharpen your sword
